title: Minimum Number of Taps to Open to Water a Garden
content:
There is a one-dimensional garden on the x-axis. The garden starts at the point 0 and ends at the point . (i.e The length of the garden is ).
There are  taps located at points  in the garden.
Given an integer  and an integer array  of length  where  (0-indexed) means the  tap can water the area  if it was open.
Return the minimum number of taps that should be open to water the whole garden, If the garden cannot be watered return -1.
